Description: Rectangular wooden outer-coffin of Sobekhotep; painted Hieroglyphic text and eye-panel.
Curator's comments: References: PM IV: p. 187 See Davies in Davies and Shofield (eds.) Egypt, the Aegean and the Levant, 1995, p. 148 [pl.10.2]. Harco Willems Chests of Life, 1988, [cat no. BH2L]. To be published by Burkhard Backes
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Frederick George Hilton Price
